command: echo '=== DEBUG INFO ===' && pwd && echo '--- Python location:' && which python3 && echo '--- Python version:' && python3 --version && echo '--- Pip list:' && python3 -m pip list | grep -i uvicorn && echo '--- PATH:' && echo $PATH && echo '--- Trying uvicorn:' && which uvicorn && echo '--- Starting app:' && cd backend && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
